title: Με Λένε Βαγγέλη
overview: Vagelis is a jobless scum who spends his life with petty thefts and drinking beer. Soon, his life is going to change as he wins 100.000 Euro on lottery. Following some unfortunate events, Vaggelis realizes the existence of karma. He tries to correct all the mistakes he has done in the past and starts pursuing only good deeds.
